description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 17(i)(a) (Land contamination remediation method statement - health centre development) and 31(i)(a) (Land contamination remediation method statement - residential development) of planning permission ref. 23658/APP/2021/1296, dated 31.08.21 (Partial demolition, refurbishment and extension of the existing Cottage Hospital to provide a state of the art health centre and the comprehensive redevelopment of the remaining Site to provide residential (use class C3) accommodation and ancillary works including car parking, cycle parking, landscaping and associated works (phased))
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge only of conditions 17 and 31. Specifically this decision notice discharges parts 17(i)(a) and 31(i)(a) attached to planning permission ref. 23658/APP/2021/1296. Further details related to the remaining outstanding parts of conditions 17 (ii - iv) and 31 (ii - iv) are required in order to fully discharge these conditions.
